Facilitating the development of new business
New and innovative business models and financing approaches have emerged to help overcome barriers
related to transactions costs by aggregating and/or transferring financing needs and establishing supply
based business models in the energy and transport sectors
is a business model whereby customers pay for an energy service without
based contracts can also be a form of creative financing
